actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A bill to amend title III of the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to require that political committees and candidates report all political contributions and expenditures regardless of amount.

summary.text: Requires, under title III of the Federal Election Campaign Act, that political committees and candidates report all political contributions and expenditures regardless of amount.

titles.title: A bill to amend title III of the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to require that political committees and candidates report all political contributions and expenditures regardless of amount.
